short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get aggregated insights for your GPTs, including chats, ratings and reviews. Connect to the dashboard for more detailed analytics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPT Builder Tools offers a streamlined way to view key metrics for your GPTs, including total chats, ratings, and reviews. From the extension's pop-up, you can access an aggregated summary of your GPTsâ€™ performance. For more detailed insights, such as individual GPT growth charts, daily performance trends, and detailed reviews over time, simply click 'See More' to connect to the full GPT Builder Tools dashboard. This extension is designed to help GPT creators optimize performance and track progress with ease, with options to install advanced analytics for deeper data-driven insights.
